languages.text: "Я видел, как генетическая мерзость искажает людской облик. При одной мысли, что этот порок может перекинуться на меня, я чувствую отвращение и ярость. Но я превозмогу".
"I have seen this aberration utterly pervert the human form. The thought of it touching me... Disgusting. Infuriating. But I will overcome this."
languages.original_text: "Я видел, как генетическая мерзость искажает людской облик. При одной мысли, что этот порок может перекинуться на меня, я чувствую отвращение и ярость. Но я превозмогу".

traits.locale_text: "I've watched this anathema pervert the human form. Just thinking about the possibility of it touching me... Disgusting. Infuriating. But I will overcome this."
"I've watched this anathema pervert the human form. Just thinking about the possibility of it touching me... Disgusting. Infuriating. But I will overcome this."
"I have seen this aberration utterly pervert the human form. The thought of it touching me... Disgusting. Infuriating. But I will overcome this."
"I have seen this anathema utterly pervert the human form. The thought of it touching me... Disgusting. Infuriating. But I will overcome this."
"I have seen this aberration utterly pervert the human form. The thought of it touching me... Disgusting. Infuriating. But I will overcome this."
"I have seen this aberration utterly pervert the human form. The thought of it touching me... Disgusting. Infuriating. But I will overcome this."
"I have seen this aberration utterly pervert the human form. The thought of it touching me... Disgusting. Infuriating. But I will overcome this."
"I have seen this aberration utterly pervert the human form. The thought of it touching me... Disgusting. Infuriating. But I will overcome this."

languages.text: « J'ai vu de mes yeux les effets délétères que cette aberration produit sur l'organisme humain. La seule pensée de le toucher me répugne et me retourne l'estomac, mais je me dois de surmonter mon dégoût. »
languages.original_text: "I have seen this aberration utterly pervert the human form. The thought of it touching me... Disgusting. Infuriating. But I will overcome this."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai vu de mes yeux les effets délétères que cette aberration produit sur l'organisme humain. La seule pensée de le toucher me répugne et me retourne l'estomac, mais je me dois de surmonter mon dégoût. »

languages.text: «He visto cómo esta aberración pervierte completamente la forma humana. Pensar en dejar que me toque... Repugnante. Enfurecedor. Pero lo superaré».
languages.original_text: "I have seen this aberration utterly pervert the human form. The thought of it touching me... Disgusting. Infuriating. But I will overcome this."

traits.locale_text: «He visto cómo esta aberración pervierte completamente la forma humana. Pensar en dejar que me toque... Repugnante. Enfurecedor. Pero lo superaré».

languages.text: “这个变异的怪物已经没有一丁点像人的地方了。一想到它会碰到我的手……我就觉得恶心，恼火不已，但我会努力克服的。”
languages.original_text: "I have seen this aberration utterly pervert the human form. The thought of it touching me... Disgusting. Infuriating. But I will overcome this."

traits.locale_text: “这个变异的怪物已经没有一丁点像人的地方了。一想到它会碰到我的手……我就觉得恶心，恼火不已，但我会努力克服的。”

languages.text: 「私はこの忌まわしきものが人の姿に変質するのを見た。それに触れのは…汚い。腹立たしい。しかし、この問題は克服しなければいけない」
languages.original_text: "I have seen this aberration utterly pervert the human form. The thought of it touching me... Disgusting. Infuriating. But I will overcome this."

traits.locale_text: 「私はこの忌まわしきものが人の姿に変質するのを見た。それに触れのは…汚い。腹立たしい。しかし、この問題は克服しなければいけない」

languages.text: "Ich habe gesehen, wie diese Abscheulichkeit die menschliche Gestalt vollkommen pervertiert hat. Der Gedanke, dass es mich berührt ... weckt Eckel. Weckt Zorn. Aber ich werde das überwinden."
languages.original_text: "I have seen this aberration utterly pervert the human form. The thought of it touching me... Disgusting. Infuriating. But I will overcome this."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe gesehen, wie diese Abscheulichkeit die menschliche Gestalt vollkommen pervertiert hat. Der Gedanke, dass es mich berührt ... weckt Eckel. Weckt Zorn. Aber ich werde das überwinden."

languages.text: "Bu sapkının insan suretini baştan aşağı bozduğunu gördüm. Bana dokunduğu düşüncesi bile... İğrenç. Sinir bozucu. Yine de bu işin üstesinden geleceğim."
languages.original_text: "I have seen this aberration utterly pervert the human form. The thought of it touching me... Disgusting. Infuriating. But I will overcome this."
